name: It was a dark and stormy night, until it wasn't
name_original: It was a dark and stormy night, until it wasn't
description:
CONTROLS:

Use the up and down arrow keys to move between options, the right arrow key to confirm a selection, and the left arrow key to go back to the previous menu. To move to another screen, select "move" and press the desired arrow direction.

---

A short experiment in environmental storytelling and in stretching the limits of the Bitsy engine. The majority of this game was made in the span of about 2 weeks, so although I did go back to it later,  it's still a little rough around the edges.

Music by Chris Weed (Itch, Twitter).
